significance: A forbidden island split between fire and ice, formerly a Navy research facility. Site of dangerous experiments by Caesar Clown.

keyEvents.title: Luffy and Law Reunion
keyEvents.description: Luffy and Law meet again on Punk Hazard after two years since Marineford.

keyEvents.title: Law Defeats Smoker
keyEvents.description: Law removes Smoker's heart on Punk Hazard, demonstrating his dominance.

keyEvents.title: Heart Switch Occurs
keyEvents.description: Law switches Smoker and Tashigi's personalities on Punk Hazard.

keyEvents.title: Kin'emon Helps Children
keyEvents.description: Kin'emon creates warm clothing for freezing children on Punk Hazard.

description: Punk Hazard is a dangerous island in the New World, split into halves of fire and ice due to a battle between admirals. It was once a Navy research facility where Dr. Vegapunk conducted experiments, but is now controlled by Caesar Clown who continues unethical experimentation.
